00039 namespace Hypertable {
00040 
00046   class ApplicationQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00047 
00048     class UsageRec {
00049     public:
00050       UsageRec() : thread_group(0), running(false), outstanding(1) { return; }
00051       uint64_t thread_group;
00052       bool     running;
00053       int      outstanding;
00054     };
00055 
00056     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, UsageRec *> UsageRecMap;
00057 
00058     class WorkRec {
00059     public:
00060       WorkRec(ApplicationHandler *ah) : handler(ah), usage(0) { return; }
00061       ~WorkRec() { delete handler; }
00062       ApplicationHandler   *handler;
00063       UsageRec             *usage;
00064     };
00065 
00066     typedef std::list<WorkRec *> WorkQueue;
00067 
00068     class ApplicationQueueState {
00069     public:
00070       ApplicationQueueState() : shutdown(false) { return; }
00071 
00072       WorkQueue           queue;
00073       WorkQueue           urgent_queue;
00074       UsageRecMap         usage_map;
00075       Mutex               queue_mutex;
00076       Mutex               usage_mutex;
00077       boost::condition    cond;
00078       bool                shutdown;
00079     };
00080 
00081     class Worker {
00082 
00083     public:
00084       Worker(ApplicationQueueState &qstate) : m_state(qstate) { return; }
00085 
00086       void operator()() {
00087         WorkRec *rec = 0;
00088         WorkQueue::iterator iter;
00089 
00090         while (true) {
00091 
00092           {  // !!! maybe ditch this block specifier
00093             ScopedLock lock(m_state.queue_mutex);
00094 
00095             while (m_state.queue.empty() && m_state.urgent_queue.empty()) {
00096               if (m_state.shutdown)
00097                 return;
00098               m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00099             }
00100 
00101             {
00102               ScopedLock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00103 
00104               rec = 0;
00105 
00106               for (iter = m_state.urgent_queue.begin();
00107                    iter != m_state.urgent_queue.end(); ++iter) {
00108                 rec = (*iter);
00109                 if (rec->usage == 0 || !rec->usage->running) {
00110                   if (rec->usage)
00111                     rec->usage->running = true;
00112                   m_state.urgent_queue.erase(iter);
00113                   break;
00114                 }
00115                 rec = 0;
00116               }
00117 
00118               if (rec == 0) {
00119                 for (iter = m_state.queue.begin(); iter != m_state.queue.end();
00120                      ++iter) {
00121                   rec = (*iter);
00122                   if (rec->usage == 0 || !rec->usage->running) {
00123                     if (rec->usage)
00124                       rec->usage->running = true;
00125                     m_state.queue.erase(iter);
00126                     break;
00127                   }
00128                   rec = 0;
00129                 }
00130               }
00131             }
00132             if (rec == 0) {
00133               if (m_state.shutdown)
00134                 return;
00135               m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00136               if (m_state.shutdown)
00137                 return;
00138             }
00139           }
00140 
00141           if (rec) {
00142             rec->handler->run();
00143             if (rec->usage) {
00144               ScopedLock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00145               rec->usage->running = false;
00146               rec->usage->outstanding--;
00147               if (rec->usage->outstanding == 0) {
00148                 m_state.usage_map.erase(rec->usage->thread_group);
00149                 delete rec->usage;
00150               }
00151             }
00152             delete rec;
00153           }
00154         }
00155 
00156         HT_INFO("thread exit");
00157       }
00158 
00159     private:
00160       ApplicationQueueState &m_state;
00161     };
00162 
00163     Mutex                  m_mutex;
00164     ApplicationQueueState  m_state;
00165     ThreadGroup            m_threads;
00166     bool joined;
00167 
00168   public:
00169 
00176     ApplicationQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00177       Worker Worker(m_state);
00178       assert (worker_count > 0);
00179       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00180         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00181       //threads
00182     }
00183 
00184     ~ApplicationQueue() {
00185       if (!joined) {
00186         shutdown();
00187         join();
00188       }
00189     }
00190 
00196     void shutdown() {
00197       m_state.shutdown = true;
00198       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00199     }
00200 
00206     void join() {
00207       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00208       if (!joined) {
00209         m_threads.join_all();
00210         joined = true;
00211       }
00212     }
00213 
00221     void add(ApplicationHandler *app_handler) {
00222       UsageRecMap::iterator uiter;
00223       uint64_t thread_group = app_handler->get_thread_group();
00224       WorkRec *rec = new WorkRec(app_handler);
00225       rec->usage = 0;
00226 
00227       HT_ASSERT(app_handler);
00228 
00229       if (thread_group != 0) {
00230         ScopedLock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00231         if ((uiter = m_state.usage_map.find(thread_group))
00232             != m_state.usage_map.end()) {
00233           rec->usage = (*uiter).second;
00234           rec->usage->outstanding++;
00235         }
00236         else {
00237           rec->usage = new UsageRec();
00238           rec->usage->thread_group = thread_group;
00239           m_state.usage_map[thread_group] = rec->usage;
00240         }
00241       }
00242 
00243       {
00244         ScopedLock lock(m_state.queue_mutex);
00245         if (app_handler->is_urgent())
00246           m_state.urgent_queue.push_back(rec);
00247         else
00248           m_state.queue.push_back(rec);
00249         m_state.cond.notify_one();
00250       }
00251     }
00252   };
